item.description:
The classic loop -- I'll fill in real descriptions later, but here's a reference:

http://home.earthlink.net/~ellozy/mt-washington-ammonoosuc.html

This is 6:40 book time, 9.6mi RT. I'm flexible on the start time.

I expect that the rockpile will be a complete zoo, since this coincides with the "Seek the Peak" weekend, but it's the best weekend I have available this summer.

Note: I may also tag Mt Monroe in there. I plan for this hike to be fairly flexible, based on what any hiking partners want to do.
item.name: Mt Washington - Ammonoosuc Ravine and Jewell Trails
